import Cookies from"js-cookie";export var setCookie=function setCookie(cookieName,CookieValue){Cookies.set(cookieName,CookieValue,{expires:7});// Expires in 7 days
};export var getCookie=function getCookie(name){var value=Cookies.get(name);return value;};export var deleteCookie=function deleteCookie(name){Cookies.remove(name);};
